bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Virginia Phonographic Records Collection consists of commercially released recordings on analog disc by Virginia based musicians and entertainers. The collection is focused between the years of 1928 - 1950 and includes major record label releases as well as independently released recordings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: A collection of commercially released phonograph recordings by Virginia musicians and entertainers between the years 1928-1950. It includes a U.S. War Department V-Disc and a recording by singer and WRVA radio personality Sunshine Sue. The collection captures a variety of musical genres and styles including country, choral, gospel, and military brass band.
Consists of digitized phonograph recordings on compact discs
